day bandana pattern cont edging and ties row 20 ch1 and turn skip 2 3 double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch into top two front bars of the 3rd double_crochet 3 double_crochet in same st skip 2 single_crochet in next st repeat until you have 2 st before the chain 2 space from the row below single_crochet in the chain 2 space skip one 3 double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch into top two front bars of the 3rd double_crochet 3 double_crochet in same st skip 2 single_crochet in next st then repeat to to the end of the row 14 triangle picots finishing with a single_crochet in the last st and then begin the ties you are now at one of the top corners of your bandana chain 30 turn skip 1 and then slip_stitch into each chain 29 next single_crochet evenly across the top of the bandana approximately 32 sts on either side of the center magic loop for a total of 64 stitches across when you reach the other corner chain 30 turn skip 1 and then sl st into each chain 29 slip_stitch into the main body of the bandana to finish finishing weave in ends wash and block play with this pattern try a different weight of yarn with a corresponding hook use different colors to stripe share your
